Struct.Name: INK_POINT
Struct.Comment: Represents a point, radius pair that makes up part of a D2D1_INK_BEZIER_SEGMENT.

Struct.Name: INK_BEZIER_SEGMENT
Struct.Comment: Represents a Bezier segment to be used in the creation of an ID2D1Ink object. This structure differs from D2D1_BEZIER_SEGMENT in that it is composed of D2D1_INK_POINT s, which contain a radius in addition to x- and y-coordinates.

Enum.Name: INK_NIB_SHAPE
Enum.Comment: Specifies the appearance of the ink nib (pen tip) as part of an D2D1_INK_STYLE_PROPERTIES structure.

Struct.Name: INK_STYLE_PROPERTIES
Struct.Comment: Defines the general pen tip shape and the transform used in an ID2D1InkStyle object.

Field.Name: nibShape
Field.Comment: The general shape of the nib used to draw a given ink object.

Field.Name: nibTransform
Field.Comment: The transform applied to shape of the nib. _31 and _32 are ignored.

Enum.Name: PATCH_EDGE_MODE
Enum.Comment: Specifies how to render gradient mesh edges.

Field.Name: ALIASED
Field.Comment: Render this edge aliased.

Field.Name: ANTIALIASED
Field.Comment: Render this edge antialiased.

Field.Name: ALIASED_INFLATED
Field.Comment: Render this edge aliased and inflated out slightly.

Field.Name: NONE
Field.Comment: Use default sprite rendering behavior.

Field.Name: CLAMP_TO_SOURCE_RECTANGLE
Field.Comment: Bitmap interpolation will be clamped to the sprite's source rectangle.

Enum.Name: ORIENTATION
Enum.Comment: Specifies the orientation of an image.

Enum.Name: IMAGE_SOURCE_LOADING_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: Option flags controlling how images sources are loaded during CreateImageSourceFromWic.

Enum.Name: IMAGE_SOURCE_FROM_DXGI_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: Option flags controlling primary conversion performed by CreateImageSourceFromDxgi, if any.

Enum.Name: TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: Option flags for transformed image sources.

Field.Name: DISABLE_DPI_SCALE
Field.Comment: Prevents the image source from being automatically scaled (by a ratio of the context DPI divided by 96) while drawn.

Struct.Name: TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES
Struct.Comment: Properties of a transformed image source.

Field.Name: orientation
Field.Comment: The orientation at which the image source is drawn.

Field.Name: scaleX
Field.Comment: The horizontal scale factor at which the image source is drawn.

Field.Name: scaleY
Field.Comment: The vertical scale factor at which the image source is drawn.

Field.Name: interpolationMode
Field.Comment: The interpolation mode used when the image source is drawn. This is ignored if the image source is drawn using the DrawImage method, or using an image brush.

Field.Name: options
Field.Comment: Option flags.

Enum.Name: GAMMA1
Enum.Comment: This determines what gamma is used for interpolation/blending.

Field.Name: G22
Field.Comment: Colors are manipulated in 2.2 gamma color space.

Field.Name: G10
Field.Comment: Colors are manipulated in 1.0 gamma color space.

Field.Name: G2084
Field.Comment: Colors are manipulated in ST.2084 PQ gamma color space.

Struct.Name: SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE
Struct.Comment: Simple description of a color space.

Field.Name: redPrimary
Field.Comment: The XY coordinates of the red primary in CIEXYZ space.

Field.Name: greenPrimary
Field.Comment: The XY coordinates of the green primary in CIEXYZ space.

Field.Name: bluePrimary
Field.Comment: The XY coordinates of the blue primary in CIEXYZ space.

Field.Name: whitePointXZ
Field.Comment: The X/Z tristimulus values for the whitepoint, normalized for relative luminance.

Field.Name: gamma
Field.Comment: The gamma encoding to use for this color space.

Enum.Name: COLOR_CONTEXT_TYPE
Enum.Comment: Specifies which way a color profile is defined.

Enum.Name: COLOR_BITMAP_GLYPH_SNAP_OPTION
Enum.Comment: Specifies the pixel snapping policy when rendering color bitmap glyphs.

Field.Name: DEFAULT
Field.Comment: Color bitmap glyph positions are snapped to the nearest pixel if the bitmap resolution matches that of the device context.

Field.Name: DISABLE
Field.Comment: Color bitmap glyph positions are not snapped.

Interface.Name: ISvgGlyphStyle
Interface.Comment: This object supplies the values for context-fill, context-stroke, and context-value that are used when rendering SVG glyphs.

Method.Name: SetFill
Method.Comment: Provides values to an SVG glyph for fill. The brush with opacity set to 1 is used as the 'context-fill'. The opacity of the brush is used as the 'context-fill-opacity' value.

Parameter.Name: brush
Parameter.Comment: A null brush will cause the context-fill value to come from the defaultFillBrush. If the defaultFillBrush is also null, the context-fill value will be 'none'.

Method.Name: GetFill
Method.Comment: Returns the requested fill parameters.

Method.Name: SetStroke
Method.Comment: Provides values to an SVG glyph for stroke properties. The brush with opacity set to 1 is used as the 'context-stroke'. The opacity of the brush is used as the 'context-stroke-opacity' value.

Parameter.Name: brush
Parameter.Comment: A null brush will cause the context-stroke value to be 'none'.

Parameter.Name: strokeWidth
Parameter.Comment: Specifies the 'context-value' for the 'stroke-width' property.

Parameter.Name: dashes
Parameter.Comment: Specifies the 'context-value' for the 'stroke-dasharray' property. A null value will cause the stroke-dasharray to be set to 'none'.

Parameter.Name: dashOffset
Parameter.Comment: Specifies the 'context-value' for the 'stroke-dashoffset' property.

Method.Name: GetStrokeDashesCount
Method.Comment: Returns the number of dashes in the dash array.

Method.Name: GetStroke
Method.Comment: Returns the requested stroke parameters.

Interface.Name: IFactory5
Interface.Comment: Creates Direct2D resources. This interface also enables the creation of ID2D1Device4 objects.

Method.Name: CreateDevice
Method.Comment: This creates a new Direct2D device from the given IDXGIDevice.

Method.Name: CreateDeviceContext
Method.Comment: Creates a new device context with no initially assigned target.

Method.Name: SetMaximumColorGlyphCacheMemory
Method.Comment: Sets the maximum capacity of the color glyph cache. This cache is used to store color bitmap glyphs and SVG glyphs, enabling faster performance if the same glyphs are needed again. If the application still references a glyph using GetColorBitmapGlyphImage or GetSvgGlyphImage after it has been evicted, this glyph does not count toward the cache capacity.

Method.Name: GetMaximumColorGlyphCacheMemory
Method.Comment: Gets the maximum capacity of the color glyph cache.

Method.Name: CreateSvgGlyphStyle
Method.Comment: Creates an SVG glyph style object.

Method.Name: DrawText
Method.Comment: Draws the text within the given layout rectangle. By default, this method performs baseline snapping and renders color versions of glyphs in color fonts.

Parameter.Name: svgGlyphStyle
Parameter.Comment: Object used to style SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: colorPaletteIndex
Parameter.Comment: The index used to select a color palette within a color font.

Method.Name: DrawText
Method.Comment: Draws the text within the given layout rectangle. By default, this method performs baseline snapping and renders color versions of glyphs in color fonts.

Parameter.Name: svgGlyphStyle
Parameter.Comment: Object used to style SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: colorPaletteIndex
Parameter.Comment: The index used to select a color palette within a color font.

Method.Name: DrawTextLayout
Method.Comment: Draw a text layout object. If the layout is not subsequently changed, this can be more efficient than DrawText when drawing the same layout repeatedly.

Parameter.Name: svgGlyphStyle
Parameter.Comment: Object used to style SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: colorPaletteIndex
Parameter.Comment: The index used to select a color palette within a color font.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Comment: The specified text options. If D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_CLIP is used, the text is clipped to the layout bounds. These bounds are derived from the origin and the layout bounds of the corresponding IDWriteTextLayout object.

Method.Name: DrawColorBitmapGlyphRun
Method.Comment: Draws a color glyph run using one (and only one) of the bitmap formats- DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PNG, DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_JPEG, DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_TIFF, or DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PREMULTIPLIED_B8G8R8A8.

Method.Name: DrawSvgGlyphRun
Method.Comment: Draws a color glyph run that has the format of DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_SVG.

Parameter.Name: svgGlyphStyle
Parameter.Comment: Object used to style SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: colorPaletteIndex
Parameter.Comment: The index used to select a color palette within a color font. Note that this not the same as the paletteIndex in the DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN struct, which is not relevant for SVG glyphs.

Method.Name: GetColorBitmapGlyphImage
Method.Comment: Retrieves an image of the color bitmap glyph from the color glyph cache. If the cache does not already contain the requested resource, it will be created. This method may be used to extend the lifetime of a glyph image even after it is evicted from the color glyph cache.

Parameter.Name: fontEmSize
Parameter.Comment: The specified font size affects the choice of which bitmap to use from the font. It also affects the output glyphTransform, causing it to properly scale the glyph.

Parameter.Name: glyphTransform
Parameter.Comment: Output transform, which transforms from the glyph's space to the same output space as the worldTransform. This includes the input glyphOrigin, the glyph's offset from the glyphOrigin, and any other required transformations.

Method.Name: GetSvgGlyphImage
Method.Comment: Retrieves an image of the SVG glyph from the color glyph cache. If the cache does not already contain the requested resource, it will be created. This method may be used to extend the lifetime of a glyph image even after it is evicted from the color glyph cache.

Parameter.Name: fontEmSize
Parameter.Comment: The specified font size affects the output glyphTransform, causing it to properly scale the glyph.

Parameter.Name: svgGlyphStyle
Parameter.Comment: Object used to style SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: colorPaletteIndex
Parameter.Comment: The index used to select a color palette within a color font. Note that this not the same as the paletteIndex in the DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN struct, which is not relevant for SVG glyphs.

Parameter.Name: glyphTransform
Parameter.Comment: Output transform, which transforms from the glyph's space to the same output space as the worldTransform. This includes the input glyphOrigin, the glyph's offset from the glyphOrigin, and any other required transformations.

Method.Name: SetPrimitiveBlend2
Method.Comment:
A new function to set blend mode that respects the new MAX blend.
Implementers of SetPrimitiveBlend2 should expect and handle blend mode: D2D1_PRIMITIVE_BLEND_MAX
Implementers of SetPrimitiveBlend1 should expect and handle blend modes: D2D1_PRIMITIVE_BLEND_MIN and D2D1_PRIMITIVE_BLEND_ADD
Implementers of SetPrimitiveBlend should expect and handle blend modes: D2D1_PRIMITIVE_BLEND_SOURCE_OVER and D2D1_PRIMITIVE_BLEND_COPY
